description: Detects the use of KrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - KrbRelay Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\KrbRelay.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"KrbRelay.exe"))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-spn\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-clsid\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-rbcd\ *")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*shadowcred*" AND process.command_line.text:"*clsid*" AND process.command_line.text:"*spn*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*spn\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*session\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*clsid\ *")))
